Package icontrol.drivers

This package contains the classes to support the different communication ports.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    GPIB_NI.gpib32
    Defines the interface required by JNA to invoke the native library.
    GPIB_NI64.gpib64
    Defines the interface required by JNA to invoke the native library.
    GPIB_Prologix.ftd2xx
    Defines the interface required by JNA to invoke the native library.
    TMCTL_Driver.TMCTL
    Defines the interface required by JNA to invoke the native library.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Device
    This is the base class from which all other Instrument-Classes should be derived.
    GenericGPIB
    Generic GPIB Instruments are registered in Dispatcher.RegisterDeviceClasses with this class as their Instrument-Class.
    GenericRS232
    Generic RS232 Instruments are registered in Dispatcher.RegisterDeviceClasses with this class as their Instrument-Class.
    GPIB_Driver
    Abstract class defining the required methods for a derived class to be recognized as a GPIB driver.
    GPIB_IOtech
    This class provides access to the IOtech Micro488/A-901 RS232-GPIB controller.
    GPIB_NI Deprecated
    GPIB_NI64
    This class provides access to the native code to access the National Instruments GPIB cards and also Agilent's GPIB cards when this special emulate NI is enabled.
    GPIB_Prologix
    This class provides access to the native code to access the Prologix's GPIB-USB.
    LAN_Driver
    "Driver" class to support network communication over TCP-IP.
    RS232_Driver
    "Driver" class to support RS232 communication in Instrument Control (iC).
    TMCTL_Driver
    This class provides access to the native code to access Yokogawa's TMCTL library.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Device.CommPorts
    Defines all implemented communication ports/protocols in any of the Instrument classes.
    Device.GPIBcontroller
    Defines the supported GPIB controllers.

Package icontrol.drivers Description

This package contains the classes to support the different communication ports. It also contains the main "driver"-class (class Device) for all Instruments.
